channel.title: CVE Feed for Becton, Dickinson and Company -- all

item.title: CVE-2018-10593|2024-09-16T17:54:34.004Z -- becton%2C%20dickinson%20and%20company -- kiestra%20and%20inoqula%20systems
item.description: A vulnerability in DB Manager version 3.0.1.0 and previous and PerformA version 3.0.0.0 and previous allows an authorized user with access to a privileged account on a BD Kiestra system (Kiestra TLA, Kiestra WCA, and InoqulA+ specimen processor) to issue SQL commands, which may result in data corruption.
